resources.string: Allow VPN to add configurations to your device.
“VPN” Would like to Add VPN Configurations

To provide you with a fast and reliable VPN service, we collect a minimum amount of data.

We Collect:

1. Device-specific information such as OS version, hardware model, and IP address to optimize our network connection to you. We do not store or log your IP address after you disconnect from the VPN.

2. Aggregated anonymous website activity data, to perform analytics on our service and to ensure you can reliably access certain websites or apps.

3. Total bandwidth consumed and time connected to our VPN service.

We do not keep logs of your online activities and never associate any domains or applications that you use with you, your device, IP address, or email.

For more information, please read our Privacy Policy.
